item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What’s really behind Trump’s abrupt pivot to Russia?
2. Apple withdraws cloud encryption service from UK after government order
3. US stocks post worst slide in two months on gloomy economic data
4. Ukraine to sign critical minerals deal ‘in the very short term’, US claims
5. Top London restaurants adopt minimum spend to deter bots and influencers
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
